pages.text: Many instruments in MIMI can be dyed a new color by combining the instrument with any dye item in a crafting grid.$(br2)The dye can be washed off by right-clicking a Cauldron with Water while holding the instrument.

pages.title: Dyeables
pages.text: The following instruments may be dyed:$(br2)$(l)Handheld:$() Accordion, Acoustic Guitar, Bagpipe, Bass Guitar, Electric Guitar, Harmonica, Kalimba, Ocarina, Music Box, Recorder$(br2)$(l)Block:$() Celesta, Drums, EDrums, Harpsichord, Keyboard Organ, Piano, Steel Drum$(br2)
